caption: Directions
doc: Show direction between 2 points with support to waypoints

ADa.caption: Waypoints List
ADa.doc: Optional list of waypoint along the route
ADa.name: waypoints_list

ADb.caption: Origin address
ADb.doc: Specifies the start location from which to calculate directions
ADb.name: origin_address

ADc.caption: Destination address
ADc.doc: Specifies the end location to which to calculate directions
ADc.name: destination_address

ADd.caption: Travel mode
ADd.doc: Specifies what mode of transport to use when calculating directions. Valid values are Driving, Bicycling, Transit or Walking.
ADd.name: travel_mode

ADf.caption: Driving options
ADf.doc: Set keys and values as needed, leave empty to ignore.   For example, a key can be "departureTime" with a value of "Current Date/Time" or a future one.  Another key can be "trafficModel" with a value of "bestguess", "pessimistic",  "optimistic ".  For more information, please visit https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/directions#DrivingOptions for options
ADf.name: driving_options

ADg.caption: Transit options
ADg.doc: Set keys and values as needed, leave empty to ignore.   When requesting transit directions, the Avoid Highways, Avoid Tolls, Waypoints List and Optimize Waypoints options will be ignored.  Possible keys are "arrivalTime ", "departureTime", "modes" and "routingPreference".  For more  information, please visit https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/directions#TransitOptions
ADg.name: transit_options

ADi.caption: Optimize Waypoints
ADi.doc: Specifies that the route using the supplied waypoints may be optimized by rearranging the waypoints in a more efficient order. If true, the Directions service will return the reordered waypoints in a waypoint_order field.
ADi.name: optimize_waypoints

ADj.caption: Avoid Ferries
ADj.doc: When set to yes indicates that the calculated route(s) should avoid ferries, if possible.
ADj.name: avoid_ferries

ADk.caption: Avoid Highways
ADk.doc: When set to yes indicates that the calculated route(s) should avoid major highways, if possible.
ADk.name: avoid_highways

ADl.caption: Avoid Tolls
ADl.doc: When set to yes indicates that the calculated route(s) should avoid toll roads, if possible
ADl.name: avoid_tolls
